Rush is a Canadian rock band formed in 1968 in the Willowdale neighbourhood 
of Toronto, Ontario. The band is composed of bassist, keyboardist, and lead 
vocalist Geddy Lee; guitarist and backing vocalist Alex Lifeson; and drummer, 
percussionist, and lyricist Neil Peart. .... Peart officially joined the band on July 29,
